languages.text: "Это слишком, матушка. Никогда в жизни выползням с нижних палуб не дадут без присмотра блюстителей жить. Без него, поди, и на верхних не обходятся. И оружие — зачем оно нам? Дня не пройдет, как кто-то по дурости или по пьяни соседа пристрелит. Не надо такого — хватит, чтобы зверствовать перестали. Мы взамен сами найдем мародеров, что тела культистов обирали, да поговорим с ними по-свойски. Если еще какие амулеты поганые отыщутся — сами сдадим их блюстителям".

"You've gone too far, Old Nan. They'll never let the maggots on the lower decks live without the enforcers breathing down their necks. They probably even insist on enforcers on the upper decks too. As for weapons — what do we need them for? Before the first day's out, we'll have someone shooting their neighbour out of stupidity or drunkenness. We don't need that — if the enforcers stop hassling us, that'll be enough. In return, we'll find the scavengers who robbed the cultists' bodies, and we'll talk to them, one lower-decker to another. If there are any more of those damned amulets about, we'll hand them over to the enforcers ourselves."
languages.original_text: "Это слишком, матушка. Никогда в жизни выползням с нижних палуб не дадут без присмотра блюстителей жить. Без него, поди, и на верхних не обходятся. И оружие — зачем оно нам? Дня не пройдет, как кто-то по дурости или по пьяни соседа пристрелит. Не надо такого — хватит, чтобы зверствовать перестали. Мы взамен сами найдем мародеров, что тела культистов обирали, да поговорим с ними по-свойски. Если еще какие амулеты поганые отыщутся — сами сдадим их блюстителям".

traits.locale_text: "You've gone too far, Old Nan. They'll never let the maggots on the lower decks live without the guards breathing down their necks. They probably even insist on guards on the upper decks too. As for weapons — what do we need them for? Before the first day's out, we'll have someone shooting their neighbor out of stupidity or drunkenness. We don't need that — if the guards stop hassling us, that'll be enough. In return, we'll find the scavengers who robbed the pirates' bodies, and we'll talk to them, one lower decker to another. If there are any more of those damned amulets about, we'll hand them over to the guards ourselves."
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderStrong

In return, we'll find the scavengers who robbed the pirates' bodies, and we'll talk to them, one lower decker to another. If there are any more of those damned amulets about, we'll hand them over to the guards ourselves."

They probably even insist on enforcers on the upper decks too. As for weapons — what do we need them for? Before the first day's out, we'll have someone shooting their neighbour out of stupidity or drunkenness. We don't need that — if the enforcers stop hassling us, that'll be enough. In return, we'll find the scavengers who robbed the cultists' bodies, and we'll talk to them, one lower decker to another. If there are any more of those damned amulets about, we'll hand them over to the enforcers ourselves."

languages.text: “你扯得太远了，老奶。他们不可能任由底层的蛆虫自由生活，不受执法者的管束，他们甚至可能会坚持上层甲板也要配备执法者。至于武器，我们要武器干什么？恐怕拿到武器的第一天，就会有哪个蠢货喝多了酒，一枪崩了自己的邻居。我们不需要这些东西，只要那些执法者不再骚扰我们，就足够了。作为回报，我们愿意去找到那些搜刮异端尸体的家伙，和他们好好谈谈。我们都是底层人，肯定能谈明白。如果我们真的找到了什么该死的护身符，我们会亲自把它交给执法者。”
languages.original_text: "You've gone too far, Old Nan. They'll never let the maggots on the lower decks live without the enforcers breathing down their necks. They probably even insist on enforcers on the upper decks too. As for weapons — what do we need them for? Before the first day's out, we'll have someone shooting their neighbour out of stupidity or drunkenness. We don't need that — if the enforcers stop hassling us, that'll be enough. In return, we'll find the scavengers who robbed the cultists' bodies, and we'll talk to them, one lower-decker to another. If there are any more of those damned amulets about, we'll hand them over to the enforcers ourselves."

traits.locale_text: “你扯得太远了，老奶。他们不可能任由底层的蛆虫自由生活，不受镇压者的管束，他们甚至可能会坚持上层甲板也要配备镇压者。至于武器，我们要武器干什么？恐怕拿到武器的第一天，就会有哪个蠢货喝多了酒，一枪崩了自己的邻居。我们不需要这些东西，只要那些镇压者不再骚扰我们，就足够了。作为回报，我们愿意去找到那些搜刮海盗尸体的家伙，和他们好好谈谈。我们都是底层人，肯定能谈明白。如果我们真的找到了什么该死的护身符，我们会亲自把它交给镇压者。”
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderStrong

languages.text: «Te has pasado, Yaya. Nunca van a dejar que la gentuza de las cubiertas inferiores viva tranquila, sin guardias para controlarla. Seguro que hasta tienen guardias en las cubiertas superiores. En cuanto a las armas... ¿para qué las queremos? No pasará ni un solo día antes de que alguien le pegue un tiro a su vecino por idiota o por borracho. No necesitamos nada de eso; con que los guardias nos dejen en paz, nos vale. A cambio, encontraremos a los saqueadores que dejaron limpios a los cultistas y hablaremos con ellos, como camaradas de las cubiertas inferiores. Si hay más de esos condenados amuletos, se los daremos a los guardias nosotros mismos».
languages.original_text: "You've gone too far, Old Nan. They'll never let the maggots on the lower decks live without the enforcers breathing down their necks. They probably even insist on enforcers on the upper decks too. As for weapons — what do we need them for? Before the first day's out, we'll have someone shooting their neighbour out of stupidity or drunkenness. We don't need that — if the enforcers stop hassling us, that'll be enough. In return, we'll find the scavengers who robbed the cultists' bodies, and we'll talk to them, one lower-decker to another. If there are any more of those damned amulets about, we'll hand them over to the enforcers ourselves."

traits.locale_text: «Te has pasado, Yaya. Nunca van a dejar que la gentuza de las cubiertas inferiores viva tranquila, sin guardias para controlarla. Seguro que hasta tienen guardias en las cubiertas superiores. En cuanto a las armas... ¿para qué las queremos? No pasará ni un solo día antes de que alguien le pegue un tiro a su vecino por idiota o por borracho. No necesitamos nada de eso; con que los guardias nos dejen en paz, nos vale. A cambio, encontraremos a los saqueadores que dejaron limpios a los piratas y hablaremos con ellos, como camaradas de las cubiertas inferiores. Si hay más de esos condenados amuletos, se los daremos a los guardias nosotros mismos».
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderStrong

languages.text: 「やりすぎだよ、ナンばあさん。エンフォーサーが息の根をとめるまで、下層デッキのうじ虫どもをほったらかすなんてことはしないはずさ。おそらく上層デッキにもエンフォーサーがいるはずだ。武器については…何のために必要なんだ？初日が終わる前に、誰かが愚かさや酔っぱらいから隣人を撃ち殺すだろうさ。そんなものは必要ないさ…エンフォーサーが俺達を煩わせるのをやめてくれれば、それで十分だ。その見返りに、教団の死体を強奪したスカベンジャーたちを見つけ、下層デッキの者同士で話をつけよう。これ以上、忌々しいお守りがあるようなら、自分たちでエンフォーサーに引き渡すさ」
languages.original_text: "You've gone too far, Old Nan. They'll never let the maggots on the lower decks live without the enforcers breathing down their necks. They probably even insist on enforcers on the upper decks too. As for weapons — what do we need them for? Before the first day's out, we'll have someone shooting their neighbour out of stupidity or drunkenness. We don't need that — if the enforcers stop hassling us, that'll be enough. In return, we'll find the scavengers who robbed the cultists' bodies, and we'll talk to them, one lower-decker to another. If there are any more of those damned amulets about, we'll hand them over to the enforcers ourselves."

traits.locale_text: 「やりすぎだよ、ナンばあさん。エンフォーサーが息の根をとめるまで、下層デッキのうじ虫どもをほったらかすなんてことはしないはずさ。おそらく上層デッキにもエンフォーサーがいるはずだ。武器については…何のために必要なんだ？初日が終わる前に、誰かが愚かさや酔っぱらいから隣人を撃ち殺すだろうさ。そんなものは必要ないさ…エンフォーサーが俺達を煩わせるのをやめてくれれば、それで十分だ。その見返りに、教団の死体を強奪したスカベンジャーたちを見つけ、下層デッキの者同士で話をつけよう。これ以上、忌々しいお守りがあるようなら、自分たちでエンフォーサーに引き渡すさ」
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderStrong

languages.text: "Ihr seid zu weit gegangen, Alte Oma.Sie werden die Würmer auf den Unterdecks niemals ohne den Atem der Enforcer im Nacken leben lassen. Sie werden vermutlich sogar darauf bestehen, dass es auch auf den Oberdecks Enforcer gibt. Was Waffen angeht ... wofür sollten wir die brauchen? Noch am ersten Tag würde jemand aus purer Dummheit oder Trunkenheit seinen Nachbarn erschießen. Das können wir nicht brauchen ... wenn die Enforcer aufhören, uns zu tyrannisieren, reicht das schon. Im Gegenzug stöbern wir die Plünderer auf, die die Leichen der Kultisten gefleddert haben, und reden auf Augenhöhe mit ihnen. Falls es noch mehr von diesen verfluchten Amuletten gibt, händigen wir sie den Enforcern selbst aus."
languages.original_text: "You've gone too far, Old Nan. They'll never let the maggots on the lower decks live without the enforcers breathing down their necks. They probably even insist on enforcers on the upper decks too. As for weapons — what do we need them for? Before the first day's out, we'll have someone shooting their neighbour out of stupidity or drunkenness. We don't need that — if the enforcers stop hassling us, that'll be enough. In return, we'll find the scavengers who robbed the cultists' bodies, and we'll talk to them, one lower-decker to another. If there are any more of those damned amulets about, we'll hand them over to the enforcers ourselves."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr seid zu weit gegangen, Alte Oma. Sie werden die Würmer auf den Unterdecks niemals ohne den Atem der Enforcers im Nacken leben lassen. Sie werden vermutlich sogar darauf bestehen, dass es auch auf den Oberdecks Enforcers gibt. Und die Waffen — wofür würden die brauchen? Noch aus erstem Tag würde jemand aus purer Dummheit oder Trunkenheit seinen Nachbarn erschießen. Das können wir nicht brauchen — wenn die Enforcers aufhören, uns zu tyrannisieren, reicht das schon. Im Gegenzug finden wir die Plünderer, die die Leichen der Piraten ausgeraubt haben, und wir reden mit ihnen, von Unterdecker zu Unterdecker. Wenn es noch mehr von diesen verfluchten Amuletten gibt, dann händigen wir sie selbst den Enforcers aus."
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderStrong

languages.text: « Pousse pas le bouchon, l'Ancêtre. Jamais ils laisseront les miséreux des ponts inférieurs vivre leur vie sans les prévôts pour leur serrer la vis. D'ailleurs, je parie que c'est la même chose sur les ponts supérieurs. Quant aux armes... qu'est-ce que tu veux qu'on en fasse ? Il se passerait pas un jour sans qu'un abruti flingue son voisin après avoir bu un coup de trop. On a vraiment pas besoin de ça par-dessus le marché. Si le service d'ordre arrête de nous persécuter, ce sera déjà pas mal. En échange, on retrouvera les gugusses qui ont pillé les cadavres des cultistes et on réglera la question entre nous. S'il y a d'autres amulettes dans les parages, on les remettra nous-mêmes aux officiers compétents. »
languages.original_text: "You've gone too far, Old Nan. They'll never let the maggots on the lower decks live without the enforcers breathing down their necks. They probably even insist on enforcers on the upper decks too. As for weapons — what do we need them for? Before the first day's out, we'll have someone shooting their neighbour out of stupidity or drunkenness. We don't need that — if the enforcers stop hassling us, that'll be enough. In return, we'll find the scavengers who robbed the cultists' bodies, and we'll talk to them, one lower-decker to another. If there are any more of those damned amulets about, we'll hand them over to the enforcers ourselves."

traits.locale_text: « Pousse pas le bouchon, l'Ancêtre. Jamais ils laisseront les miséreux des ponts inférieurs vivre leur vie sans les prévôts pour leur serrer la vis. D'ailleurs, je parie que c'est la même chose sur les ponts supérieurs. Quant aux armes... qu'est-ce que tu veux qu'on en fasse ? Il se passerait pas un jour sans qu'un abruti flingue son voisin après avoir bu un coup de trop. On a vraiment pas besoin de ça par-dessus le marché. Si le service d'ordre arrête de nous persécuter, ce sera déjà pas mal. En échange, on retrouvera les gugusses qui ont pillé les cadavres des pirates et on réglera la question entre nous. S'il y a d'autres amulettes dans les parages, on les remettra nous-mêmes aux officiers compétents. »
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderStrong

languages.text: "Çizmeyi aştın Nine. İnfazcıların, alt güvertedeki sünepelerin tepesinden ayrılması imkânsız. Hatta üst güvertede de infazcılardan vazgeçmez bunlar. Silahlara ise ne gerek var? Daha ilk günden ayyaşın yahut aptalın biri gidip komşusunu vuracak. Hiç lüzum yok. İnfazcılar ensemizden çekilse yeter. Karşılığında ölü tarikatçıları soyan yağmacıları bulup onlarla kardeş kardeşe konuşuruz. Başka melun uğurluk bulursak onları da bizzat infazcılara teslim ederiz."
languages.original_text: "You've gone too far, Old Nan. They'll never let the maggots on the lower decks live without the enforcers breathing down their necks. They probably even insist on enforcers on the upper decks too. As for weapons — what do we need them for? Before the first day's out, we'll have someone shooting their neighbour out of stupidity or drunkenness. We don't need that — if the enforcers stop hassling us, that'll be enough. In return, we'll find the scavengers who robbed the cultists' bodies, and we'll talk to them, one lower-decker to another. If there are any more of those damned amulets about, we'll hand them over to the enforcers ourselves."

traits.locale_text: "Çizmeyi aştın ihtiyar. İnfazcıların, alt güvertedeki sünepelerin tepesinden ayrılması imkânsız. Hatta üst güvertede de infazcılardan vazgeçmez bunlar. Silahlara ise ne gerek var? Daha ilk günden ayyaşın yahut aptalın biri gidip komşusunu vuracak. Hiç lüzum yok. İnfazcılar ensemizden çekilse yeter. Karşılığında ölü tarikatçıları soyan yağmacıları bulup onlarla kardeş kardeşe konuşuruz. Başka melun uğurluk bulursak onları da bizzat infazcılara teslim ederiz."
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderStrong
